rule: The chatbot must classify any provided input text into one of four predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: New breakthrough in quantum computing promises faster processing speeds.
validityText:
The input provided consists of a single sentence and does not constitute a complete news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a news article suitable for classification into one of the specified categories.

ERR
